document.full_text: the united states was placed with canada, panama and guadeloupe in the easiest of the three groups for the first round of this summer's concacaf gold cup.
document.title: gold cup coming to new york, but u.s. probably isn't
lines_and_colors: the united states was placed with canada, panama and guadeloupe in the easiest of the three groups for the first round of this summer's concacaf gold cup.
